text: My 6yrs kid enjoys lesson at Kel's Music. Teacher Constance is very patient and dedicated. My kid respones well to her systematic teaching and is progressing well

My 2 kids are leaning the piano and violin with teacher Lynn. My intention is to let my kids be exposed to music and develop their interest in it so that they will have the motivation to hone their own musical knowledge and skills. Teacher Lynn is patient and kind. My kids are young (5 & 7) and l am happy they are enjoying lessons and looking forward to performing their favourite songs on stage together with other children in the music school.
My daughter enjoys her piano lessons with Kel Music. Teacher is nice and patience with young child. Great encouragement in her music journey.

We’ve been with Kel’s for almost 6 years. My son tried different instruments and lessons until he chose drums. I am grateful to Kel’s staff for attention and dedication with my kid. Drum classes are the only lessons that my son does not want to stop doing. I think it says a lot.
Fun and joyful experience learning violin and piano. Very helpful and engaging teacher.
